message_1: Find all prime numbers between 20 and 40 (inclusive).
message_2:
To find all the prime numbers between 20 and 40, we will check each number to see if it is divisible by any number other than 1 and itself.

Prime numbers between 20 and 40 are:

23: Divisible only by 1 and 23.
29: Divisible only by 1 and 29.
31: Divisible only by 1 and 31.
37: Divisible only by 1 and 37.

So, the prime numbers between 20 and 40 (inclusive) are 23, 29, 31, and 37.
